document_data.name: ''Crimson Chain''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Crimson chain''''' was a type of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[chainmail]] armor that originated from the nation of [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: The links of the mail were crafted from a type of red-hued metal that was found beneath the [[Cloud Peaks]] mountain range.
document_data.Notable Owners:
Members of the [[Bloodway]] adventuring company all worse suits of ''crimson chain''.

Most of the armor was lost over time, but one suit found its way into the possession of [[Ribald Barterman]], who ran the [[Adventurer Mart]] in [[Athkatla]].
